node.detail_zh: 患者為第 #4972 宗個案患者的女兒，居於屯門兆禧苑樂禧閣，就讀屯門五邑鄒振猷學校，最後返校日期為 9 月 11 日。她無外遊記錄，9 月 14 日出現症狀，由檢疫中心送院。另一名同住家人（第 #4981 宗個案患者）亦於同日確診。
node.detail_en: The patient is the daughter of patient #4972, resides at Lok Hei House, Siu Hei Court, and is a student at The Districts Business Welfare Association School (FDBWA) Chow Chin Yau School in Tuen Mun. Her last day at school was Sept 11. She has no recent travel history and exhibited symptoms on September 14. She was hospitalised from quarantine centre. Another family member whom she lives with (patient #4981) was diagnosed on the same day.
node.classification_zh: 本地個案的密切接觸者

node.location_en: Lok Hei House, Siu Hei Court
